alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 22 at 10:39AM PST until January 22 at 11:15AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 1115 AM PST. * At 1037 AM PST, a severe thunderstorm was southeast of El Cajon, moving east towards Jamul. HAZARD...50 to 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Torrential heavy rain possible. * Locations impacted include... El Cajon, Alpine, Rancho San Diego, Crest, Potrero, Spring Valley, Skye Valley, Jamul, Barrett Lake, Syucan Indian Reservation, Japatul Valley, Dulzura, Casa De Oro-Mount Helix, Harbison Canyon, and Otay Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
